meaningMnemonic: 結婚 is <kanji>marriage</kanji>, so the verb version of that would be <vocabulary>to marry</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>to get married</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own. It will help to know 結婚 first, though.
